languages.text: {n}Безумец поднимает к лицу кривые пальцы и вонзает когти в обвисшую плоть. С воплем, в котором чудится облегчение, он отрывает клок щеки, затем следующий — и еще один, и еще... Упав на колени, он лихорадочно выцарапывает собственные глаза, размазывая кровь и вытекшие белки по лицу, прежде чем рухнуть замертво на помост.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: раздирает себе лицо, в конце куя падает на колени и замертво

traits.locale_text: {n}Горгориус поднимает к лицу кривые пальцы и вонзает когти в обвисшую плоть. С воплем, в котором чудится облегчение — он сдирает клочок щеки, словно это обрывок ветхой ткани. Затем следующий — и еще один, и еще... Трясясь, писарь протягивает вам сочащиеся кровью обрывки.{/n} "Обмен! Честный обмен! Бери! Бери-и..." {n}Упав на колени, он лихорадочно выцарапывает собственные глазницы, размазывая кровь и вытекшие белки глаз по лицу.{/n}

languages.translation_comment: раздирает себе лицо, в конце куя падает на колени и замертво

languages.text: {n}The madman raises his crooked fingers to his face and sinks his nails into its sagging flesh. Shrieking with what sounds like relief, he tears off a piece of his cheek, then another, and then one more... Falling to his knees, he frantically scratches his own eyes out, smearing blood and clear ichor across his face before collapsing dead on the platform.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Безумец поднимает к лицу кривые пальцы и вонзает когти в обвисшую плоть. С воплем, в котором чудится облегчение, он отрывает клок щеки, затем следующий — и еще один, и еще... Упав на колени, он лихорадочно выцарапывает собственные глаза, размазывая кровь и вытекшие белки по лицу, прежде чем рухнуть замертво на помост.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The madman raises his crooked fingers to his face and sinks his claws into the sagging flesh. With a shriek apparent relief, he rips off a chunk of his cheek, and then another, and then one more... Falling to his knees, he frantically scratches his own eyes out, smearing blood and clear ichor across his face before collapsing dead on the platform.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那个疯子将蜷曲的手指举到脸上，指甲刺入下垂的皮肤里。随后他尖叫起来，仿佛松了口气一般。他扯掉了脸上的肉，随后又扯下一块，之后是第三块……他跪倒在地，疯狂地抠着自己的眼珠，脸上沾满了鲜血与透明的脓液。随后，他便倒在行刑台上，死了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The madman raises his crooked fingers to his face and sinks his nails into its sagging flesh. Shrieking with what sounds like relief, he tears off a piece of his cheek, then another, and then one more... Falling to his knees, he frantically scratches his own eyes out, smearing blood and clear ichor across his face before collapsing dead on the platform.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那个疯子将蜷曲的手指举到脸上，指甲刺入下垂的皮肤里。随后他尖叫起来，仿佛松了口气一般。他扯掉了脸上的肉，随后又扯下一块，之后是第三块……他跪倒在地，疯狂地抠着自己的眼珠，脸上沾满了鲜血与透明的脓液。随后，他便倒在行刑台上，死了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El loco se lleva los dedos torcidos a la cara y se clava las uñas en su fofa carne. Con un chillido de aparente alivio, se arranca un trozo de la mejilla, luego otro, y luego otro más... Luego se hinca de rodillas y se arranca los ojos en un arrebato frenético, chorreando sangre y humores vítreos antes de desplomarse muerto sobre el estrado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The madman raises his crooked fingers to his face and sinks his nails into its sagging flesh. Shrieking with what sounds like relief, he tears off a piece of his cheek, then another, and then one more... Falling to his knees, he frantically scratches his own eyes out, smearing blood and clear ichor across his face before collapsing dead on the platform.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deli adam, çarpık parmaklarını yüzüne değdirip tırnaklarını sarkan etine geçiriyor. Sanki rahatlamış gibi çığlık atarak yanağının bir parçasını koparıyor ve koparmaya devam ediyor. Dizlerinin üzerine düşerek çılgınca kendi gözlerini oyuyor, yüzüne kan ve irin bulaşmış olan ölüsü platforma yığılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The madman raises his crooked fingers to his face and sinks his nails into its sagging flesh. Shrieking with what sounds like relief, he tears off a piece of his cheek, then another, and then one more... Falling to his knees, he frantically scratches his own eyes out, smearing blood and clear ichor across his face before collapsing dead on the platform.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deli adam, çarpık parmaklarını yüzüne değdirip tırnaklarını sarkan etine geçiriyor. Sanki rahatlamış gibi çığlık atarak yanağının bir parçasını koparıyor ve koparmaya devam ediyor. Dizlerinin üzerine düşerek çılgınca kendi gözlerini oyuyor, yüzüne kan ve irin bulaşmış olan ölüsü platforma yığılıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その怒り狂った男は曲がった指を顔に向け、たるんだ肉に爪を食い込ませる。ほっとしたような悲鳴を上げながら、頬の一部をちぎり、また別の部分をちぎり、さらに…彼の膝に落ち、死に物狂いで目をほじくり出し、顔の上に血と透明な膿を塗りたくり、台上で倒れて死ぬ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The madman raises his crooked fingers to his face and sinks his nails into its sagging flesh. Shrieking with what sounds like relief, he tears off a piece of his cheek, then another, and then one more... Falling to his knees, he frantically scratches his own eyes out, smearing blood and clear ichor across his face before collapsing dead on the platform.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その怒り狂った男は曲がった指を顔に向け、たるんだ肉に爪を食い込ませる。ほっとしたような悲鳴を上げながら、頬の一部をちぎり、また別の部分をちぎり、さらに…彼の膝に落ち、死に物狂いで目をほじくり出し、顔の上に血と透明な膿を塗りたくり、台上で倒れて死ぬ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le dément porte ses mains aux doigts crochus à son visage et plonge ses ongles dans la chair flasque. Avec un hurlement qui n'est pas sans évoquer un certain soulagement, il s'arrache un lambeau de joue, puis un autre, et ainsi de suite... Tombant à genoux, il extirpe frénétiquement ses yeux de ses orbites, maculant son visage de sang et de lymphe avant de s'effondrer raide mort sur la plateforme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The madman raises his crooked fingers to his face and sinks his nails into its sagging flesh. Shrieking with what sounds like relief, he tears off a piece of his cheek, then another, and then one more... Falling to his knees, he frantically scratches his own eyes out, smearing blood and clear ichor across his face before collapsing dead on the platform.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Wahnsinnige hebt seine krummen Finger an sein Gesicht und gräbt seine Nägel in sein schlaffes Fleisch. Offenbar vor Erleichterung kreischend reißt er sich ein Stück aus der Wange, dann noch eines ... und noch eines ... Er fällt auf die Knie, kratzt sich manisch die eigenen Augen aus, verschmiert Blut und andere Körpersäfte auf seinem Gesicht, bevor er tot zusammensinkt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The madman raises his crooked fingers to his face and sinks his nails into its sagging flesh.
